parameter.name: origin_x
Origin X
parameter.comment: Move the origin of the kaleidoscope along the X axis

parameter.name: origin_y
Origin Y
parameter.comment: Move the origin of the kaleidoscope along the Y axis

parameter.name: segmentation
Segmentation
parameter.comment:
Kaleidoscope segmentation / 128;
segmentations of 1, 2, or multiples of 4 work best. Default is 16

parameter.name: specify_source
Specify source segment
parameter.comment:
If checked, the source angle
is read from the source segment, otherwise it is auto calculated

parameter.name: source_segment
Source segment
parameter.comment:
Center of the source segment. Only used if Specify Source Segment is checked.
0 is in +x and rotates counter clockwise.

parameter.name: reflect_edges
Reflect edges
parameter.comment:
If checked, reflections that end up outside the source reflect back into it.
Otherwise the specified background color is used.

parameter.name: edge_threshold
Edge threshold
parameter.comment:
Edge threshold / 4, reflections
outside the image but within this distance clamp to the edge.

parameter.name: preferred_corner
Preferred corner
parameter.comment:
If Reflect Edges is not checked,
this parameter defines the preferred corner.

parameter.name: corner_search
Corner Search
parameter.comment:
If checked, search clockwise for furthest corner.
Otherwise search counter clockwise.

parameter.name: bg_color
Background color
parameter.comment:
Color to use if reflection lies
outside of the source image and not reflecting back in.

parameter.name: bg_alpha
Use alpha background
parameter.comment:
If checked, alpha will be used
if reflection lies outside of the source image and not reflecting back in.
